text: Qat'aa, a form of poetry, is a part of soazkhwani / mersiya-khwani. Qat'aa is also known as Ruba'ee and performed before marsiya-khwani. When Qat'aa, Ruba'ee, Soaz, Salaam and Marsiya are performed combined it is called soazkhwani / marsiya-khwani. ==See also== *Na`at ==External links== * Babulim Students Society, Karachi, Pakistan *Sherosukhan-Salaam Category:Islamic poetry
title: Qat'aa
